scripts.auth:demo: node scripts/toggle-auth.js && echo 'Switched to Demo mode'
scripts.auth:real: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const content=fs.readFileSync('.env','utf8').replace(/AUTH=(true|false)/,'AUTH=true'); fs.writeFileSync('.env',content); console.log('Switched to Real mode (MongoDB)')"
scripts.auth:status: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const content=fs.readFileSync('.env','utf8'); const match=content.match(/AUTH=(true|false)/); console.log('Current auth mode:', match ? (match[1]==='true' ? 'MongoDB (Real)' : 'Demo') : 'Not set')"
